title: Smoky Halloumi Pasta Bake
text:
300g pasta
2 cloves garlic
1 onion
2 tsp smoky paprika
250g halloumi
1 large courgette
150g cheddar
2 tins chopped tomatos


Preheat oven 180 fan
Cook pasta for 5 minutes and drain
Fry onion, garlic and 1 tsp paprika
Add cubed halloumi & courgette
Put pasta, chopped tomatos and veg in a baking tin
Topped with grated cheese and 1 tsp paprika
Bake for 10 minutes

title: Groundnut Stew
text:
1kg sweet potatoes 1cm slices
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
2cm ginger
1 chilli
50g peanut butter
time profile
1 tin of tomatoes
400ml veg stock
coriander
salted peanuts


Preheat oven 180 fan
Mix sweet potatoes, onion, garlic chill in roasting tin with oil and sea salt. Roast for 45 min
Add chopped toms, peanut butter and stock back into oven for 15 min
Serve with rice, coriander and peanuts
